Table	Create Table
courses	CREATE TABLE `courses` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `tutorId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `subject` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `gradeLevel` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `price` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL,
  `duration` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `sessionsPerWeek` int(11) DEFAULT '1',
  `totalSessions` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `isActive` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `imageUrl` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `courses_tutorId_users_id_fk` (`tutorId`),
  KEY `courses_tutorId_idx` (`tutorId`),
  KEY `courses_subject_idx` (`subject`),
  CONSTRAINT `courses_tutorId_users_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`tutorId`) REFERENCES `jiuvaqiRLMtCC23XtAnX7G`.`users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin AUTO_INCREMENT=60001
